name: AnymeX
subtitle: Your new favourite tracking and management tool
description:
This is the official source for AnymeX.

For full details, check the GitHub repository:
https://github.com/RyanYuuki/AnymeX

apps.name: AnymeX
apps.subtitle: Multiservice tracking client
apps.localizedDescription: AnymeX is a multiservice tracking client, with AniList, MyAnimeList & Simkl support!

versions.localizedDescription:
🎉 New Features
